results.title: Enigma of Rabies: Prolonged Survival in a Boy with Rabies Brachial Plexitis and Encephalomyelitis.
results.text_hl: He received five doses of the @<m>DISEASE_Rabies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011818 @@@rabies@@@ vaccine as post exposure prophylaxis.
